verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Being Past <S%G1230><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The Mother <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Salome <S%G4539><s%> Bought <S%G59><s%> Aromatics, <S%G759><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> They Might Anoint <S%G218><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Very <S%G3029><s%> Early <S%G4404><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Of The Week <S%G4521><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> Having Risen <S%G393><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun. <S%G2246><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Said <S%G3004><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Will Roll Away <S%G617><s%> For Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb? <S%G3419><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Up <S%G308><s%> They See <S%G2334><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Has Been Rolled Away <S%G617><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone : <S%G3037><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For It Was <S%G1063><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Very. <S%G4970><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Young Man <S%G3495><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Right, <S%G1188><s%> Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> A Robe <S%G4749><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Greatly Amazed. <S%G1568><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Be Amazed. <S%G1568><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Ye Seek <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nazarene, <S%G3479><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Crucified. <S%G4717><s%> He Is Risen, <S%G1453><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Here; <S%G5602><s%> Behold <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> They Laid <S%G5087><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Peter, <S%G4074><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Goes Before <S%G4254><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee : <S%G1056><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Shall Ye See, <S%G3700><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Quickly <S%G5035><s%> They Fled <S%G5343><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb. <S%G3419><s%> <S%G2192><s%> And Possessed <S%G1161><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Trembling <S%G5156><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Amazement, <S%G1611><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To No One <S%G3762><s%> Anything (lit. Nothing) <S%G3762><s%> , They Spoke, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5399><s%> For They Were Afraid. <S%G1063><s%>

<S%G450><s%> Now Having Risen <S%G1161><s%> Early The <S%G4404><s%> First Day <S%G4413><s%> Of The Week <S%G4521><s%> He Appeared <S%G5316><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> To Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Had Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>

She <S%G1565><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> Told It <S%G518><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Had Been, Who Were <S%G1096><s%> Grieving <S%G3996><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Weeping. <S%G2799><s%>

And They <S%G2548><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Is Alive <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Has Been Seen <S%G2300><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Disbelieved It. <S%G569><s%>

<S%G3326><s%> And After <S%G1161><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> To Two <S%G1417><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> As They Walked <S%G4043><s%> He Was Manifested <S%G5319><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Form, <S%G3444><s%> Going <S%G4198><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Country; <S%G68><s%>
And They <S%G2548><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> Told It <S%G518><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Rest; <S%G3062><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> Them <S%G1565><s%> Did They Believe. <S%G4100><s%>

Afterwards <S%G5305><s%> As Reclined At Table <S%G345><s%> They <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Eleven <S%G1733><s%> He Was Manifested <S%G5319><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reproached <S%G3679><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G570><s%> Their Unbelief <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hardness Of Heart, <S%G4641><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Seen <S%G2300><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Arisen <S%G1453><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Believed Not. <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> All <S%G537><s%> Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Creation. <S%G2937><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Baptized <S%G907><s%> Shall Be Saved, <S%G4982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He That <S%G1161><s%> Disbelieves <S%G569><s%> Shall Be Condemned. <S%G2632><s%>

<S%G4592><s%> And Signs <S%G1161><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> Shall Follow : <S%G3877><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name <S%G3450><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> They Shall Cast Out; <S%G1544><s%> With Tongues <S%G1100><s%> They Shall Speak <S%G2980><s%> New; <S%G2537><s%>

Serpents <S%G3789><s%> They Shall Take Up; <S%G142><s%> And If <S%G2579><s%> Deadly <S%G2286><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> They Drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> , Shall It Injure; <S%G984><s%> Upon The <S%G1909><s%> Infirm <S%G732><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> They Shall Lay, <S%G2007><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> They Shall Be. <S%G2192><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Was Taken Up <S%G353><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sat <S%G2523><s%> At The <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1565><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Gone Forth <S%G1831><s%> Preached <S%G2784><s%> Everywhere, <S%G3837><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Working With Them, <S%G4903><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Confirming <S%G950><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Following Upon It <S%G1872><s%> Signs. <S%G4592><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
